summary: Captain Marvel: 10 Things We Want In Her Movie (And 10 Things We Don't)
title: Captain Marvel: 10 Things We Want In Her Movie (And 10 Things We Don't)
excerpt: Captain marvels has so much lore to dip into, it's downright intimidating! So, what should Marvel tap, and what should it leave alone? CBR explores!
description:

blog.name: maxmarvel123
blog.title: II~MaxMarvel123~II
blog.description:
Hey, how's going?
My fave staff are comic books, TV series, video games, etc.
I'm an art collector (well...kind of) who like collecting artwork fan-art, design, redesign, sketchbook, illustration and every galleries, i'm posting comic panels and pages.
I'm a Marvel fan (NOT a shitty ass MCU, a Marvel Comics fan), there's lot of comic publishers i like are DC Comics, Dark Horse Comics, Valiant Comics, Image Comics, etc etc etc!
As in 2018, my blog is now "sensitive content" because Tumblr didn't like my stuff. Yeah....kiss my fucking coconuts @staff

summary: you know what they gonna reveal the title and someone will find out that it was in some movie all this time either on a building...
body: you know what they gonna reveal the title and someone will find out that it was in some movie all this time either on a building or on a bag of chips or tattooed on some random guy’s arm??? cuz like I was watching spiderman homecoming and ned says the number of pieces for death-star  3,803 and thats like almost 8th March? which the release date for captain marvel?? I KNOW IM LIKE READING TOO MUCH INTO IT BUT ITS MARVEL’S FAULT!!!!

summary: 8 theories for why Nick Fury called Captain Marvel
title: 8 theories for why Nick Fury called Captain Marvel
excerpt: Carol Danvers, aka Captain Marvel, will be making her big screen debut in March 2019. That may still be eight months away, but Avengers: Infinity War has already brought Captain Marvel into the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

summary: Lego Marvel Super Heroes 2 Now Available To Mac-OS Users
title: Lego Marvel Super Heroes 2 Now Available To Mac-OS Users
body:
Lego Marvel Super Heroes get to have a bite of the Apple!

Feral Interactive has announced that Lego Marvel Super Heroes 2, the brick-based adventure set in the Marvel Universe, will be released for MacOS on August 2, 2018. Previously released for Windows and console, now is the time for Mac users to get in on the action.

Play as the Guardians of the Galaxy, Spider-Man, Thor, Hulk, Black Panther,…

View On WordPress

summary: CAPTAIN MARVEL: MS. MARVEL — A HERO IS BORN OMNIBUS HC CONNER COVER Written by CHRIS CLAREMONT with GERRY CONWAY, ARCHIE...
caption:
CAPTAIN MARVEL: MS. MARVEL — A HERO IS BORN OMNIBUS HC CONNER COVER

Written by CHRIS CLAREMONT with GERRY CONWAY, ARCHIE GOODWIN, JIM SHOOTER, DAVID MICHELINIE, GEORGE PEREZ, BOB LAYTON, PETER B. GILLIS & SIMON FURMAN
Penciled by JIM MOONEY & MIKE VOSBURG with JOHN BUSCEMA, SAL BUSCEMA,
GEORGE PEREZ, DAVE COCKRUM, MICHAEL GOLDEN, JOHN BYRNE, FRANK MILLER, GEORGE TUSKA, KEITH POLLARD, CARMINE INFANTINO, HOWARD CHAYKIN, JEFF ACLIN, JUAN ORTIZ & MIKE GUSTOVICH
Covers by AMANDA CONNER & JOHN ROMITA SR.
When NASA Security Chief Carol Danvers’ genetic structure was melded with alien Kree DNA, Danvers was imbued with amazing powers — and an all-new Marvel hero was born! But before she became Captain Marvel, Carol Danvers was Ms. Marvel — with X-Men writer Chris Claremont weaving together complex plots and compelling characterization to craft her iconic original adventures! Witness Carol’s first meeting with the Avengers! The debuts of Mystique and Rogue! Battles with Ronan the Accuser, Sabretooth and the Guardians of the Galaxy! And Carol’s story reaches its epic conclusion in a Marvel milestone guest-starring the X-Men and the Avengers! Collecting MS. MARVEL (1977) #1-23, MARVEL TEAM-UP (1972) #61-62 and #76-77, DEFENDERS (1972) #57, MARVEL TWO-IN-ONE (1974) #51, AVENGERS (1963) #200 and ANNUAL #10, and material from AVENGERS (1963) #197-199, MARVEL SUPER-HEROES (1990) #10-11 and MARVEL FANFARE (1982) #24.
720 PGS./Rated T …$100.00
ISBN: 978-1-302-91539-1
Trim size: Oversized
CAPTAIN MARVEL: MS. MARVEL — A HERO IS BORN OMNIBUS HC ROMITA COVER (DM ONLY)
720 PGS./Rated T …$100.00
ISBN: 978-1-302-91540-7
Trim size: Oversized
